featured.text: Jack made a(n)______ payment on the new computer because he did not have enough money for it.
Many athletes and VIPs demand payment for their signatures, and many people are willing to pay.

definition.zh_def: 支付，通常指為商品或服務所付的金額。
definition.en_def: The act of giving money in exchange for goods or services.
definition.example: She made the payment for her new laptop online.
